price: Ati tukifa na tukawa udongo? Kurejea huko kuko mbali!
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ
footnotes: Ati baada ya kwisha kufa na tukawa udongo, tutafufuliwa tena? Huko kufufuliwa baada ya kufa ni marejeo yaliyo mbali, hayawi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
